title: I’m OP, but I Began an Inn - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Male to Female   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World
author: nyonnyon
description:
A man died young and was sent to another world with a cheat-like power!?

――But, I don’t really feel like doing anything amazing. I just want to start my own inn. Nevertheless, I’ll aim for the #1 inn in the world!!>
